TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PrincipalPermissionMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 當使用 來控制方法的存取時，設定授權檢查的模式。

span.span: Sets the mode for authorization checks when using the to control access to a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當套用 至方法時，這個模式會指定在授權存取時，要使用哪一組角色。When applying the to a method, this mode specifies which set of roles to use when authorizing access. 根據預設，屬性會使用 Windows 群組 (例如，`Administrator` 或 `Users`) 來指定使用者必須屬於的角色。By default, the attribute uses Windows groups (such as `Administrator` or `Users`) to specify the role to which the user must belong. 如果要以程式設計的方式設定模式，請建立 `ServiceHost` 類別的執行個體，然後在其行為集合中找出 ，再將 設定為適當的列舉型別。To set the mode programmatically, create an instance of the `ServiceHost` class, then find the in its collection of behaviors, and set the to the appropriate enumeration. 下列範例會將屬性設定為 UseAspNetRoles 中。The following example sets the property to UseAspNetRoles. [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#1)] 您也可以設定在組態中的行為，藉由新增[ <serviceAuthorization> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/serviceauthorization-element.md)來[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)的組態檔，如下列程式碼所示。You can also set the behavior in configuration by adding a [<serviceAuthorization>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/serviceauthorization-element.md) to the [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) of a configuration file, as shown in the following code. [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#10)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#10)] 列舉型別會影響 屬性在套用至方法時，授權使用者的方式。The enumeration affects how the attribute authorizes a user when it is applied to a method. 下列範例會將此屬性套用至方法，並要求使用者屬於電腦上的 Users 群組。The following example applies the attribute to a method and demands that the user belong to the Users group on the computer. 這個程式碼只有在 設定為 `UseWindowsGroup` (預設值) 時才能運作。This code works only when the is set to `UseWindowsGroup` (the default setting). [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#2)] ## UseAspNetRolesUseAspNetRoles UseAspNetRoles 值使用於所有認證類型。The UseAspNetRoles value is used for all credential types. 這個模式可讓 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 來做出授權決策中使用 ASP.NET 角色提供者。This mode enables Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to use the ASP.NET role provider to make authorization decisions. 當服務的認證為 X.509 憑證時，您可以將 `Name` 的 屬性設定為由 [主旨] 欄位和 [指紋] 欄位的串連值所組成的字串，如下列範例所示。When the credential for a service is an X.509 certificate, you can set the `Name` property of the to a string that consists of the concatenated values of the Subject field and the Thumbprint field, as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#3)] 串連字串是由以分號和空格隔開的主旨和指紋值所組成。The concatenated string consists of the subject and thumbprint values separated by a semicolon and a space. 有的憑證可能會將 [主旨] 欄位設定為 null 字串。It is also possible for a certificate to have a Subject field set to a null string. 在這種情況中，您可以將 `Name` 屬性設定為分號後面接空格，然後再接指紋，如下列範例所示。In that case, you can set the `Name` property to a semicolon followed by a space and then the thumbprint, as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#4)] 如果 ASP.NET 角色提供者存在，您也可以將 屬性設定為資料庫中的角色。If an ASP.NET role provider is present, you can also set the property to a role in the database. 根據預設，資料庫是由 來表示。By default, the database is represented by the . 您也可以使用 類別的 屬性來設定自訂角色提供者。You can also set a custom role provider with the property of the class. 下列程式碼會將角色設定為 `Administrators`。The following code sets the role to `Administrators`. 請注意，角色提供者必須將使用者帳戶對應至該角色。Note that the role provider must map the user account to that role. [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#13)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#13)] 如需有關 ASP.NET 角色提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [How To： 使用 ASP.NET 2.0 中的角色管理員](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96692)。For more information about the ASP.NET Role provider, see [How To: Use Role Manager in ASP.NET 2.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96692). 如需使用 WCF 和角色提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 使用 ASP.NET 角色提供者搭配服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-the-aspnet-role-provider-with-a-service.md)。For more information about using WCF and the role provider, see [How to: Use the ASP.NET Role Provider with a Service](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-the-aspnet-role-provider-with-a-service.md). ## 自訂Custom 當屬性設定為 Custom 時，您也必須提供自訂的類別可實作類別。When the property is set to Custom, you must also provide a custom class that implements the class. 這個類別負責提供呼叫者在 `IPrincipal` 集合內的 表示法。This class is responsible for providing the caller's `IPrincipal` representation inside the collection. 它必須使用 "Principal" 字串索引鍵將 `IPrincipal` 執行個體儲存至屬性集合，如下列範例所示。It must store the `IPrincipal` instance to the properties collection using the "Principal" string key, as shown in the following example. ``` evaluationContext.Properties["Principal"]=new CustomPrincipal(identity); ``` ## 背景Background [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中的角色安全性可讓應用程式透過程式碼來指定授權。The role-based security in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] enables applications to specify authorizations through code. 藉由指定 要求， 必須滿足 `PrincipalPermission` 需求。By specifying the demand, the must satisfy the `PrincipalPermission` requirement. 例如，使用者必須屬於特定的角色或群組。For example, that the user must be in a specific role or group. 否則，執行緒不會獲得執行程式碼的授權，而造成例外狀況。Otherwise, the thread is not authorized to execute the code, which results in an exception. WCF 會提供一組選取項目來指定根據據此。WCF provides a set of selections to specify the based on accordingly. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定 UseAspNetRoles。The following example shows how to specify UseAspNetRoles. [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#7)] 下列範例示範如何指定自訂。The following example shows how to specify Custom. [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode Always = int32(4)

summary.span: 一律可讓使用者為 指定自訂 類別。

span.span: Always enables the user to specify a class for .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode Custom = int32(3)

summary.span: 可讓使用者為 指定自訂 類別。

span.span: Enables the user to specify a custom class for .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode UseAspNetRoles = int32(2)

summary.span: 是根據 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 角色提供者 () 設定的。

span.span: is set based on the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] role provider ().

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode UseWindowsGroups = int32(1)

summary.span: 是根據 Windows () 設定的。
如果使用者身分識別未與 Windows 帳戶建立關聯，便會使用匿名 Windows。

span.span: If the user identity is not associated with a Windows account, anonymous Windows is used.
